item.title: Multichannel Lockin v2.11.10.43
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v2.11.10.43
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 12 Nov 2020 14:40:58 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462). This version is configured to handle multiple cards (up to 16) for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO. You can configure a number of analog outputs (up to 32) to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with DC offsets. Each of the analog inputs (up to 32) can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [2.11.10]
- Bug fix Issue #33 Sweep mode
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.5.3.43
item.description:
Product: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.5.3.43
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 12 Nov 2020 14:40:53 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Program for logging PPMS status to the DSC. Provides a UI and API for controlling the magnet field, temperature, and rotator angle (for PPM2)

Release Notes: [1.5.3]
1. Bug fixes in PPMS2 APIs
2. Updated B field limits:
- PPMS LHe (%)
- 0 - 50: B = 0 T
- 51 - 60: B < 1 T
- 61 - 100: B < 9 T

- PPMS 2 LHe (%)
- 0 - 70: B = 0 T
- 71 - 100: B < 1 T
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Transport v1.4.3.20
item.description:
Product: Transport v1.4.3.20
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Mon, 09 Nov 2020 19:59:52 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Control Experiment.lvclass]
Control Experiment.vi provides a uniform way to record information about your sample & device, how the lockin is connected to the device, configures the Krohn Hite amplifier (and Pickering switch if you have one), and sets the base path for saving data.

[SweepControl.lvclass]
Sweep Control.vi: Sequencer for stepping multiple parameters. Calls VIs in Transport.lvclass
Continuous B sweep.vi: For sweeping B continuously while asynchronously calling VIs in Transport.lvclass

[Transport.lvclass]
Basic transport measurments.
- Lockin vs Vsg (or Vbg) (Lockin_Vsg.vi)
- Lockin vs Time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi (under development)
- IV curves (IV.vi)

Release Notes: [1.4.3]
- Bug fixes: write TDMS, Issues #12, #13, #15, #16, #17, #18, #19, #20, #21
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: LVtoITX v3.0.5.13
item.description:
Product: LVtoITX v3.0.5.13
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Mon, 09 Nov 2020 16:57:25 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Collection of VIs to write and read Igor Text Files (*.itx), text-based spreadsheet data files (*.dat), and TDMS

Release Notes: [3.0.5]
---> beta release! This is a major rewrite; code is still being tested and examples are being written <---
- This release invludes many bug fixes for TDMS R/W:
- Make read and write more reliable
- Fix issues with "append index"
- Fix issue writing notes to TDMS file
- add error handling if Comments section or Channel groups are not found (ie, add support for legacy TDMS files that uses Comments and Data groups; newer files use "Notes" at File level and "Data.index" channel group.
item.dc:creator: LevyLab
